ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale
ygData.msgSnippet: I think its simple economics if people decide to pay RL money for in game items/money.  If they don t want to spend the in game time camping an item but really
ygData.messageBody:
I think its simple economics if people decide to pay RL money for in game items/money.  If they don't want to spend the in game time camping an item but really want it then by all means feel free to do so.  Take a RBG (Ruined Branded Girdle, dropped as a VERY rare drop off of any Froglok Krup Xxxxx in Old Sebilis.) I have spent untold hours here and have seen a grand total of ......... 0 (Zero, yes) drop.  If there was someone who was very well off in RL and really enjoyed the game I wouldn't think he was a bad person or a weirdo for purchasing the PP to buy it or the item itself.  I cant do it I have other things to do with my money (bills, blah) but if I was very well off I wouldn't rule out that I might do that, but that's just me.  I might get flamed for saying this but I guess such is life.
 
I do however think this is not the place to be "auctioning" the pp or whatever he might have. Even so, $150 us for 10k is still really high, I guess you would have to be really well off in RL to buy this. 
 
Mu
55 Enchanter
Tunare Server
55 Warrior
Tunare Server
 
BTW, I will write another email to the news group later today maybe depending on how much sleep I get on my good places to make money so maybe people can save their RL money.  Instead of camping an item for a week you could camp a really good PP place and within a week easily have enough money to buy most any item in game that sells for PP.  And on my server I have seen just about every tradable item for sale, Including Trak BP's and VS legs.
-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Rhodes [mailto:mrhodes@...]
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 6:33 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale

I'd be careful giving that info out.... as much as I would love to know where to get the kind of plat, I'm sure if everyone knew, the place would be camped worse then any other place in eq
 
just my 2cp
 
Mike
-----Original Message-----
From: The Mad Macinchaote [mailto:scendera@...]

To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale

Where?
----- Original Message -----
From: Nygaardr, FC3
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 4:03 AM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale

What a rip though.  $150 US for 10,000pp??!?!  So your telling me I can make $450 US a day playing EQ?  Thats crazy if anyone would pay that much.  I know of one spot where you can easily farm 30k pp a day if not more, seems a bit crazy to me,
 
Mu
-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Rhodes [mailto:mrhodes@...]
Sent: Sunday, April 29, 2001 9:27 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale

Is there anyone out there that would actually pay real money for this??  There is no way I would... Am I crazy?
 
Mike
